newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine T-bill yields mixed at auction.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine T-bill yields mixed at auction.

text.p: Average yields at auctions of six-month, 12-month Ukraine discount treasury bills edged down and yields on nine-month bills firmed from previous sales, a central bank statement said on Friday.
Six-month bills edged down to 23.55 percent from 23.70 percent, nine-month bills firmed to 28.89 percent from 28.83 percent and 12-month bills slipped to 32.87 percent from 32.89 percent.
Results of six-month T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume 7.00 million UAH 9.00 million UAH
Amount sold 7.00 million UAH 7.86 million UAH
Actual amount raised 6.26 million UAH 7.03 million UAH
The central bank sold 70,000 T-bills, the bank statement said. Of those, 47,044 were competitive and 22,956 were non-competitive bids.
The date of the next auction of six-month discount T-bills is unfixed.
The results of the nine-month discount T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume 24.00 million UAH 13.00 million UAH
Amount sold 5.19 million UAH 9.32 million UAH
Actual amount raised 4.27 million UAH 7.67 million UAH
The central bank sold 51,949 T-bills, the bank's statement said. Of those, 41,031 were competitive and 10,918 were non-competitive bids.
The date of the next auction of nine-month discount T-bills is unfixed.
The results of the 12-month discount T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume 40.00 million UAH 20.00 million UAH
Amount sold 38.90 million UAH 20.00 million UAH
Actual amount raised 29.30 million UAH 15.06 million UAH
The central bank sold 389,033 T-bills, the bank's statement said. Of those, 361,237 were competitive and 27,796 were non-competitive bids.
The date of the next auction of 12-month discount T-bills is unfixed.
